casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jimmie Columbus CHRISTMAS, Jr. No. 382P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Christmas.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd day of August 2004 by Attorney General in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of August 2004."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attoreny General on the 2nd day of August 2004 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of August 2004."
